forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. S winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. S winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
